Title: ConvertSourceToHtml
Description: This is a standalone version of the popular Visual Studio plugin 'CopySourceAsHtml'. ConvertSourceToHtml replaces RTF code in your clipboard by HTML code that you can paste in your website or blog.
HomeWiki:
ConvertSourceToHtml is a standalone version of the popular Visual Studio plugin CopySourceAsHtml. ConvertSourceToHtml was created for Visual Studio Express users because the Express editions do not support plugins. ConvertSourceToHtml replaces RTF code in your clipboard by HTML code that you can paste in your website or blog.
